name: @metacell/geppetto-meta-client
description: Geppetto web frontend. Geppetto is an open-source platform to build web-based tools to visualize and simulate neuroscience data and models.

scripts.build: yarn build:js && yarn build:package && yarn build:style
scripts.build:dev: yarn build:js-dev && yarn build:package && yarn build:style
scripts.publish:yalc: yalc push --sig && cd build && yalc publish --push
scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,ts --ignore build --exec "babel src -d build --extensions '.js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx' && yalc push --changed"
